籭字的基本解释

籭
shāi
古同“筛”。

籭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shāi］
［《廣韻》所宜切，平支，生。］
［《廣韻》山佳切，平佳，生。］
(1)同“篩”。竹筛。
(2)见“籭簁”。

籭字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【竹字部】　籭； 康熙笔画：25； 页码：页906第06
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?山宜切，音凘。竹器。可以取麤去細。　又【集韻】【正韻】?霜夷切，音師。義同。　又【集韻】所綺切，音躧。與簁同。　又【廣韻】山佳切【集韻】所佳切，?音崽。【廣韻】竹名。【集韻】?具。或作簛簁篩。

籭字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
籭字的起名意思

暂无。

Yan
Basic explanation of words
Yan
shāi
Gu Tong "sieve".
Yan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [shāi]
["Guangyun" is suitable for cutting, flat branch, raw. ]
["Guangyun" Shan Jiaqie, Ping Jia, Health. ]
(1) Same as "sieve". Bamboo sieve.
(2) See "籭簁".
Yan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set on] [Bamboo Character Department] 　籭; Kangxi Strokes: 25; Page Number: Page 906 Page 06
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Shan Yiqie, Yin Rong. Bamboo ware. You can take the coarser to the finer.　[Jiyun] [Zhengyun]? Shuangyiqie, sound engineer. The same meaning.　 [Jiyun] The beautiful cut, the sound. Same as 簁.　[Guangyun] Shan Jiaqie [Jiyun] So Jiaqie, sound cub. [Guangyun] Bamboo name. 【Ji Yun】? With. Or as a sieve.
